          <title>
            <string language="en">Copper-oxygen reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kupfer-Sauerstoff Reaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction du Cuivre-oxygène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reação do Cobre-oxigênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazione dell'Rame-ossigeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση χαλκός-οξυγόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reacción del Cobre-oxi'geno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This incomplete flowchart describes the stages of reaction between copper and oxygen.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">word equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses unvollständige Flußdiagramm beschreibt 
die Stadien der Reaktion zwischen Kupfer und Sauerstoff. Dieses 
kann in einer beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet organigramme inachevé décrit les étapes de
la réaction entre le cuivre et l'oxygène. Ceci peut être 
utilisé dans un exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este fluxograma incompleto descreve os estágios 
da reação entre o cobre e o oxigênio. Isto pode ser usado em 
um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma di flusso incompleto descrive le
fasi di reazione fra rame ed ossigeno. Ciò può essere usata in
un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το ελλιπές διάγραμμα ροής περιγράφει τα στάδια 
της αντίδρασης μεταξύ του χαλκού και του οξυγόνου. Αυτό 
μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este organigrama incompleto describe las etapas de
la reacción entre el cobre y el oxígeno. Esto se puede 
utilizar en un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
